definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Your intended recipients will be able to unscramble it with ease.
sentences.chinese: 您預期的收件人將能夠輕鬆地解讀它。

sentences.english: Explanation: What is that on the horizon?
sentences.chinese: 解讀，是什麼出現在地平線上呢？

sentences.english: Any kind of interpretation of a text is exegesis.
sentences.chinese: 任何方式的解讀經文都是解經。

sentences.english: On to unscrambling But Arthur wasn't done.
sentences.chinese: 對解讀但阿瑟卻沒有這樣做。

sentences.english: How are Lakers fans supposed to interpret these comments?
sentences.chinese: 湖人球迷應當這麼解讀加索爾的表態呢？

sentences.english: Greeks could read texts like this also.
sentences.chinese: 希臘人也可以這麼解讀經文。

sentences.english: From the process of human being's cognition on relation of man and nature, this paper gives some explanation on systematic dialectics.
sentences.chinese: 從人類關於天人關係的認識歷程對此作一解讀。

sentences.english: To know paralanguage exactly is quite essential for successful communication.
sentences.chinese: 正確解讀副語言符號是交際成功的必要條件。

sentences.english: God is the author of the text, the centrality of Christ as key for scriptural interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是經文的作者，以基督爲中心是解讀經文的關鍵。

sentences.english: Many of the papyri had not been read for over a thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 很多的紙莎草紙一千多年來都沒有被解讀。

sentences.english: Deciphering food labels is tricky business.
sentences.chinese: 解讀食品標籤是一件棘手的事情。

sentences.english: This part explains deeply every kind of pressure of career development.
sentences.chinese: 本章對每一種職業發展壓力作了深入解讀。

sentences.english: I wonder what is your views about, what does philosophy have to say with life after death?
sentences.chinese: 我也很好奇，您認爲，哲學將怎樣解讀來世？

sentences.english: It is very significant to study on the text of Halfbreed.
sentences.chinese: 對《混血兒》的文本解讀和研究是十分有意義的。

sentences.english: In this article, We appreciate the series of work in three aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文擬從三個方面來解讀《馬詩》。

sentences.english: Feministic criticism also appears in the later years of last century.
sentences.chinese: 上世紀後期也有人通過女性主義對其作品進行解讀。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
